dict.string:
on alfred_script(shellCmd) -- `cd` -> do not trigger post-cd-hook (`-q`) and `clear` afterwards if (text 1 thru 3 of shellCmd) is "cd " then set arg to text 4 thru -1 of shellCmd -- leading space to suppress saving in shell history -- `-q` to suppress post-cd-hook output set shellCmd to " cd -q " & arg & " && clear" end if
-- run the shortcut tell application "Shortcuts" run shortcut named "ghostty-input" with input shellCmd delay 2 quit end tell end alfred_script
